quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), 5th Poshan Pakhwada celebrations have been kick started.

Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to 5th Poshan Pakhwada?

A.      Poshan Pakhwada is celebrated annually in March for 21 days.

B.      Ministry of Health and Family Welfare is the nodal Ministry for coordinating activities.

C.      One of the key themes of activities organized under 5th Poshan Pakhwada is promotion and popularization of Shree Anna / Millets for nutritional- well-being.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text:
As per recent (March 2023) news, initiatives by Government of India to promote AI in Health Sector have been mentioned in the Parliament. The Ministry of Health & Family Welfare has designated which of the following institute(s) as Centre of Excellence for Artificial Intelligence?

A.      All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Delhi

B.      Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education & Research (PGIMER), Chandigarh

C.      AIIMS Rishikesh
options: A only
A and B
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the National Strategy and Roadmap for Medical and Wellness Tourism? 

A.      It has been formulated by Ministry of Health and Family Welfare.

B.      It was formulated in 2022.

C.      The strategy document focuses on six key pillars.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
B only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the National Center for Vector Borne Diseases Control (NCVBDC), Delhi, has organized a technical symposium to develop a strategic framework and roadmap for dengue control in India. A suggestion was made to include dengue under the MoHFW’s Integrated Health Information Platform (IHIP). How many diseases are already covered under the IHIP?
options: 11
22
33
44
39

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Union Minister of State for Health and Family Welfare has submitted a reply regarding mental health services in primary health Centres. WHO estimates that the burden of mental health problems in India is _______ disability-adjusted life years (DALYs) per 10,000 population.
options: 2443
2143
1443
943
3143

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to National Programme for Prevention and Control of Cancer, Diabetics, Cardiovascular Disease and Stroke (NPCDS)?

A.      It was launched in 2014.

B.      Central Government alone bears the cost of the initiative.

C.      Under the initiative, persons more than 20 years of age are targeted for their screening.
options: A and B
A and C
C only
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), information has been shared by Union Minister of Ayush regarding measures taken to protect the ancient and traditional knowledge of the country. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the Traditional Knowledge Digital Library (TKDL)?

A.      TKDL was established in 2001.

B.      It was established by CSIR and Department of Indian Systems of Medicine and Homeopathy.

C.      The information is documented in a digitized format in nine international languages.
options: A and B
B and C
C only
B only
A and C

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), a reply has been submitted by Union Minister of State for Health and Family Welfare regarding the PPP model in medical colleges and regulations by National Medical Commission (NMC). Indian Medical Council (IMC) Act has been replaced by the National Medical Commission Act that came into existence on 8th August __________.
options: 2022
2021
2015
2012
2019

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, Sagar Parikrama Phase IV program has been held in ____________.
options: Gujarat and Maharashtra
Gujarat
Karnataka & Goa
Karnataka and Kerala
Kerala and Tamil Nadu

quiz.text: India contributes 8% of the global share of fish production and is ranked as the __________ largest fish producer in the world.
options: 5th
4th
8th
2nd
3rd

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the initiatives to promote wind energy in India has been mentioned in the Parliament. Which of the following initiatives is/are correct?
options: Declaration of trajectory for Wind Renewable Purchase Obligation (Wind RPO) up to 2030.
Generation Based Incentive (GBI) provided to the wind projects commissioned on or before 31 March 2017.
Provision of technical support through the National Institute of Wind Energy (NIWE), Gandhinagar.
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), initiatives to promote energy storage capacity in India has been mentioned in the Parliament. Government of India had announced a Viability Gap Funding support for __________ MWh Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) in Union Budget 2023-24.
options: 1,000
10,000
4,000
8,000
5,000

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs (CCEA) has exempted NTPC Limited from the extant guidelines of delegation of power to Maharatna Central Public Sector Enterprises (CPSEs) to invest in NTPC Green Energy Limited (NGEL), a Subsidiary Company of NTPC Ltd. CCEA also exempted NGEL’s investment in NREL and its other Joint Venture (JVs)/subsidiaries subject to a ceiling of ________ of its net worth beyond the monetary ceiling of Rs 5,000 crore to Rs. 7,500 crore.
options: 15%
10%
20%
25%
33%

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the ‘Project for Creating 250 Model Gram Panchayat Clusters across India’?
options: It was launched in 2021.
It aims to train the Young Fellows and State project coordinators to enable them to create 250 model Gram Panchayat clusters across India.
It is being implemented by National Institute of Rural Development and Panchayati Raj (NIRDPR), Hyderabad.
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: As per Ethanol Blending Programme (EBP), target is to achieve _______ blending of ethanol in petrol by Ethanol supply year (ESY) 2025-26.
options: 10%
15%
25%
30%
20%

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, Green Tug Transition Programme has been launched by which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of Power
Ministry of Ports, Shipping & Waterways
Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
Ministry of Finance

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the PENCIL portal?

A.      PENCIL stands for ‘Platform for Effective Enforcement of No Child Labour’.

B.      It was launched in the year 2004.

C.      It has been launched by the Ministry of Women & Child Development.
options: A and B
B and C
B only
A only
None of the above

quiz.text: According to the National Family Health Survey 2019-21 (NFHS-5), what percentage of women between the age of 20 and 24 were married before 18 years of age?
options: 47%
27%
23%
10%
5%

quiz.text: Recently, SRIJAN Portal has been mentioned in the Parliament. It is the initiative of which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of MSME
Ministry of Defence
Ministry of Power
Ministry of Labour and Employment
Ministry of rural Development

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), it has been informed that the government headed by Prime Minister Narendra Modi has also introduced a monthly allowance of _________ for up to one year for women-led StartUps.
options: ₹10,000
₹20,000
₹25,000
₹15,000
₹50,000

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the Code on Wages 2019?

A.      According to the code minimum wages should not be less than the floor wage.

B.      Floor wages are to be fixed by the Central Government and state governments.

C.      It has a provision of equal remuneration to male and female workers.
options: C only
A and B
A, B and C
A and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), a National Conference of ‘Bhumi Samvaad IV on Implementation of ULPIN or Bhu-Aadhaar’ has been organized in Delhi. Department of Land Revenue has a target of 100% of land records under Bhu-Aadhaar by _________.
options: 2023
2025
2027
2030
2024

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the CPGRAMS?
options: It was launched in 2017.
It has been launched by Department of Personnel and Training.
It is an online web-enabled system developed by National Informatics Centre.
It is a single portal connected to all the Ministries/Departments of Government of India and States.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Union Minister of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution stated that the SMART-PDS is a technological driven initiative and the need of hour, therefore, all the States/UTs should make earnest efforts to implement SMART-PDS at the earliest. What does ‘M’ in SMART stands for?
options: Metering
Measurement
Modernization
Modification
None of the above

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, which of the following places has been declared as the first Tourism & Cultural Capital of Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO)?
options: Beijing
Kashi
Astana
Saint Petersburg
New Delhi

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the first cross border energy pipeline between India and Bangladesh- India Bangladesh Friendship Pipeline (IBFP) from Siliguri (India) to Parbatipur (Bangladesh) has been inaugurated in a virtual mode. It is the ________ cross-border energy pipeline between India and its neighbours.
options: first
second
third
fourth
fifth

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Labour20 (L20) engagement group’s inception meet, as part of India’s G20 Presidency, has been held in which of the following places?
options: Cochin
Bhopal
Salem
Amritsar
Puducherry

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) has roped in _____________ as a knowledge partner for the G-20 Education Working Group (EWG).
options: NIT Srinagar
IISc, Bengaluru
IIT Madras
IIM, Ahmedabad
ISB, Hyderabad

quiz.text: A two-day inception meeting of the_________, the new engagement group of G20 initiated by India, had been held in Hyderabad.
options: Labour20
Parliament20
Science20
Think20
Startup20

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the fourth Y20 (Youth-20) consultation meeting has been held at Symbiosis International University, Lavale, Pune. Which of the following were the Sub-themes at the meeting?
options: Climate Action
Gender related conflict and reforms
Education
Legal Reforms needed for Social Change
All of the above

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, the Second Indo-Pacific Economic Framework (IPEF) negotiating round has been held in ____________.
options: Brisbane, Australia
Auckland, New Zealand
Bali, Indonesia
Hanoi, Vietnam
Tokyo, Japan

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to IPEF?

A.      It was launched and led by United States of America.

B.      It has 14 members including China.

C.      IPEF is a Free Trade Agreement.
options: A and B
B and C
A only
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Union Minister of State for Electronics and Information Technology has shared information regarding the target of electronics manufacturing at ‘New India for Young India’. India’s target is to increase electronics manufacturing capability to __________ by 2025-2026
options: Rs 24 Lakh crore
Rs 14 Lakh crore
Rs 28 Lakh crore
Rs 18 Lakh crore
Rs 15 Lakh crore

quiz.text: Maritime India Vision (MIV) 2030 estimates investments of ________ crore for capacity augmentation and development of world-class infrastructure at Indian Ports.
options: Rs. 2,00,000–2,25,000
Rs. 50,000–75,000
Rs. 1,25,000–1,50,000
Rs. 1,00,000–1,25,000
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), 3rd annual edition of the International SME Convention 2023 (ISC) has been organized jointly by which of the following entities?
options: Ministry of MSME
Ministry of External Affairs
India SME Forum
Govt. of Madhya Pradesh
All of the above
